### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE device_locations (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE device_status (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    battery_level INT,
    connected BOOLEAN,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE device_metadata (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(100),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    model VARCHAR(100),
    firmware_version VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_management (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100),
    location_id UUID,
    last_inspected TIMESTAMP,
    inspection_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE location_history (
    device_id UUID,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE device_status SET status = 'Active', connected = true, battery_level = 80, last_updated = NOW() WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
